original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Doctors said many cases of the Influenza virus are reported among children at present.
Specialist at the Lady Ridgeway Hospital for Children Dr. Deepal Perera advised those with symptoms to wear face masks to prevent the spread of the disease.
He said the symptoms include cough, cold, headache, fever and vomitting.
